hero.title: Checklists and templates to support your routines.
hero.subtitle: Short, focused PDFs that live next to your Avenqor courses and AI strategies. Print them, pin them, or keep them open while you work – they are built for real trading desks, not slideshows.

features.checklists: Risk and process checklists that fit on a single page.
features.templates: Templates for sizing, journaling and weekly reviews.
features.behaviour: Focus on behaviour and risk, not entries alone.

sideCard.title: How resources connect to your courses
sideCard.subtitle: Think of them as tools that sit next to your PDFs.
sideCard.paragraph1: When you work through an Avenqor course, you will see references to supporting resources: checklists, templates and review sheets. This page is the hub where you can access them in one place.
sideCard.paragraph2: Some resources may unlock together with specific courses, while others will be available to all signed-in users as part of general education material.

resources.title: Core Avenqor resources.
resources.subtitle: This is a preview set. In production, the list will grow as new courses and AI templates are released.
resources.disclaimer: Downloads here are placeholders – links will be wired to real PDFs in-app.

items.title: Risk Management Foundations
items.subtitle: Guide · Start here
items.description: A clear overview of how to limit risk before you even think about entries: account-level risk, risk per trade, daily loss limits and what to do after a losing streak.

items.title: Position Sizing Made Simple
items.subtitle: Guide · Sizing basics
items.description: How to connect account size, risk percentage and stop distance to position size or lot size – with simple examples for Forex, Crypto and Binary structures.

items.title: Daily Trade Journal Principles
items.subtitle: Framework · Process
items.description: What a useful trading journal actually tracks: entries and exits, reasoning, rule breaks, screenshots and emotional notes – without turning journaling into a second job.

items.title: Weekly Review Playbook
items.subtitle: Framework · Review
items.description: A simple loop to review the last week: what worked, what did not, where rules were broken and which adjustments you'll test next week.

items.title: Pre-Session Preparation
items.subtitle: Checklist · Routine
items.description: A short, repeatable routine for the 15–20 minutes before you look at any chart: environment, focus, key levels, important news and risk limits for the session.

items.title: Strategy Snapshot Overview
items.subtitle: Guide · Strategy map
items.description: How to summarise any strategy on a single page: market conditions, setup criteria, entry/exit rules, risk model and the typical mistakes to watch for.

useWithCourses.title: Use with your courses
useWithCourses.subtitle: Attach each resource to a specific module.
useWithCourses.description: Many Avenqor PDFs will include small icons or notes that link directly to a matching resource – for example, a risk checklist near the risk chapter or a journal sheet near a process module.

buildRoutines.title: Build steady routines
buildRoutines.subtitle: Use the same sheets for at least a few weeks.
buildRoutines.description: Instead of constantly switching tools, pick a small set of resources you actually use daily: one journal page, one checklist and one weekly review. Adjust them only when you see patterns over time.

focusBehaviour.title: Focus on behaviour
focusBehaviour.subtitle: Keep notes on rules, not just outcomes.
focusBehaviour.description: When you review filled-out checklists and journals, pay attention to how often you followed your own rules. The goal is to build discipline first; performance metrics come after.

cta.title: Resources support your decisions – they do not replace them.
cta.subtitle: Checklists and templates can help you stay organised and consistent. They do not remove market risk or guarantee any outcome. Avenqor remains education only.
